item.title: Famitsu Sales: 7/7/25 – 7/13/25
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Mario Kart World continues to dominate.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for week of July 7, 2025 to July 13, 2025.

PATAPON 1+2 REPLAY was the highest selling new release of the week, opening at 8,871 retail copies sold on Switch. The PlayStation 5 and PC versions were only released digitally.

On the hardware side, Switch 2 sold 71,885 units, the Switch family sold 13,411 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 7,262 units, the Xbox Series family sold 247 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 30 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [SW2] Mario Kart World (Nintendo, 06/05/25) – 65,853 (1,365,072)
  2. [NSW] Tamagotchi Plaza (Bandai Namco, 06/26/25) – 13,736 (140,198)
  3. [NSW] 1+2 REPLAY (Bandai Namco, 07/10/25) – 8,871 (New)
  4. [NSW] Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (Nintendo, 04/28/17) – 6,944 (6,373,204)
  5. [NSW] Animal Crossing: New Horizons (Nintendo, 03/20/20) – 5,824 (8,166,316)
  6. [NSW] Super Mario Party Jamboree (Nintendo, 10/17/24) – 5,478 (1,343,780)
  7. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 5,022 (3,933,889)
  8. [PS5] Death Stranding 2: On the Beach (SIE, 06/26/25) – 4,162 (87,597)
  9. [SW2] Tamagotchi Plaza (Bandai Namco, 06/26/25) – 4,095 (36,695)
  10. [NSW] FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time (LEVEL-5, 05/21/25) – 3,583 (144,758)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on July 18.

  1. [NSW] Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma (Marvelous, 06/05/25) –
  2. [SW2] Yakuza 0 Director’s Cut (SEGA, 06/05/25) –
  3. [SW2] Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma (Marvelous, 06/05/25) –
  4. [NSW] ToHeart (AQUAPLUS, 06/26/25) –
  5. [NSW] RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army (ATLUS, 06/19/25) –
  6. [NSW] Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet (The Pokemon Company, 11/18/22) –
  7. [SW2] The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Nintendo, 06/05/25) –
  8. [NSW] Nintendo Switch Sports (Nintendo, 04/29/22) –
  9. [SW2] The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Nintendo, 06/05/25) –
  10. [PS5] Elden Ring Nightreign (Bandai Namco, 05/30/25) –
  11. [NSW] Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (Nintendo, 12/07/18) –
  12. [NSW] Clubhouse Games: 51 Worldwide Classics (Nintendo, 06/05/20) –
  13. [NSW] Splatoon 3 (Nintendo, 09/09/22) –
  14. [SW2] Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour (Download Card) (Nintendo, 06/05/25) –
  15. [NSW] The Battle Cats: Unite! (Ponos, 12/03/20) –
  16. [NSW] Castlevania Anniversary Collection (Superdeluxe Games, 06/26/25) –
  17. [NSW] Super Mario Bros. Wonder (Nintendo, 10/20/23) –
  18. [NSW] The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (Nintendo, 03/03/17) –
  19. [PS5] RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army (ATLUS, 06/19/25) –
  20. [NSW] Kirby and the Forgotten Land (Nintendo, 03/25/22) –
  21. [NSW] Donkey Kong Country Returns HD (Nintendo, 01/15/25) –

Hardware Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. Switch 2 – 71,885 (1,602,711)
  2. Switch OLED Model – 6,166 (9,092,077)
  3. Switch Lite – 4,828 (6,609,511)
  4. PlayStation 5 – 4,260 (5,717,491)
  5. Switch – 2,417 (20,122,966)
  6. PlayStation 5 Pro – 2,064 (229,626)
  7. PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – 938 (979,053)
  8. Xbox Series S – 118 (338,702)
  9. Xbox Series X – 54 (320,982)
  10. Xbox Series X Digital Edition – 75 (21,063)
  11. PlayStation 4 – 30 (7,929,752)
